ai_bomb_place_reason: I will place a bomb at {coord}.
ai_double_move_1: I will place the first stone at {coord}.
ai_double_move_2: And now, the second stone at {coord}!
ai_reason_template: I will place a stone at {coord} {reason}.
ai_swap_reason: I will use a cheat to swap your stone({userCoord}) with my stone({aiCoord}).
ai_veto_reason: I deny your destiny leading to {coord}.
feedback_desc: Let us know about AI loopholes, bugs, or new ideas!
game_settings_desc: Select cheats (modes) for the AI. Difficult modes provide more rewards.
game_subtitle: An exciting cheat match against AI
guest_save_notice: As a guest, game records are saved temporarily in this browser. To preserve your records, please sign up.
mode_basic_desc: Play against the AI with standard Omok rules, no cheats allowed.
mode_normal_desc: You set the cheats the AI can use.
mode_ranked_desc: The AI uses random cheats. Compete with pure skill!
nickname_in_use_alert: This nickname is already in use.
nickname_rule_alert: Nickname must be 2-10 characters long and contain only letters and numbers.
no_new_mail:
‚òÄÔ∏è Summer Season: Part 1 Update Complete!

A major overhaul of the game is complete. Experience the world of Cheat Omok, now reborn!

Key Changes:
  • New Lobby Environment: Prepare for your match in a more comfortable and intuitive space.
  • Shop & Inventory: Purchase and manage unique skins using 'Luna'.
  • New Skins Added: 'Galaxy' and 'Rainbow' stone skins are now available.
  • New Game Modes: Enjoy diverse gameplay with 'Basic', 'Normal', and 'Ranked' modes.
password_recovery_notice: Note: Passwords cannot be recovered, so please remember it!
reason_attack_3: to create a strong Live Three attack
reason_attack_4: to create a decisive Live Four
reason_block_3: to block your Live Three attack
reason_block_4: to block your Live Four attack
reason_win: because I can win with this move
select_mode_desc: Please select a game mode to play.
signup_success_alert: Sign up successful! You will be logged in automatically.
system_bomb_fail: Couldn't find a good spot to place a bomb.
system_denied_spot: You cannot place a stone there.
system_forbidden: Forbidden move! Please choose another location.
system_no_move: AI could not find a place to move.

notes: Introduced the Shop and Inventory systems
Added new Game Modes (Basic, Normal, Ranked)
Added AI Win Rate display feature.
Enhanced AI's early-game response logic and performance.
Added XP gain based on game results.
Added golden visual effect and sound for level-ups.
Added level and experience display to the profile popup.
UI/UX Improvement: Redesigned the Mail/News popup for a consistent look and feel.
Added sound effects to button clicks.
Added Login and Sign Up features
Added move counter to the log
